denude.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to remove the plants and trees that cover an area of land
denude.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: a hillside denuded in a fire
denude.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to take something away from someone or something
denude.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: The fact that people have left farm work has denuded many villages of their working populations.
